messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: Run many of our biggest cities including Liverpool, Sheffield and Bristol. Won more votes than Labour in the last elections. Are stronger now than at any time since 1929. Can deliver real change across Britain today.

messages.title: The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services. We will put more police on patrol, restore the earnings link and deliver fair pay for the armed forces. We can make this pledge because we have identified real savings to pay for it. The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.

messages.title: Gordon Brown's record of shame
messages.content: Spending squeeze for NHS despite Darling's promise.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn - cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and abolish university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and home insulation.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal for you from the politicians
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.
Refurbish and re-open the existing baths, rather than waste millions on knocking them down and building a new town.

quotes.text: Spending squeeze for NHS despite Darling's promise

images.caption: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.
Sam Boote with Vince Cable MP
